title.rendered: Abahani defeated Brothers by a big margin

content.rendered:
Brothers Union lost 5-0 to Bashundhara Kings in the Premier League. This time the team of Gopibag lost by a big margin in the Federation Cup.Abahani beat Brothers 6-0 today at Bashundhara Kings Arena.  

Washington scored a hat trick for the team. Apart from this, Cornelius scored two goals and Nabib Newaz Jiban scored the other goal. Andres Cruciani’s Abahani took the lead 15 minutes into the match at the Bashundhara Kings Arena. Washington’s cross from the edge was not cleared properly by the defender inside the box. Jeevan made no mistake getting the ball in the gap to beat the goalkeeper. After 15 minutes the margin of the match was doubled. Washington is the scorer this time. Brothers Union changed the goalkeeper in the 35th minute. The first half ended with a 2-0 scoreline.

After the break, Abahani’s attempts were blocked once again by the goalkeeper. In the 56th minute, Cornelius’ shot was blocked by goalkeeper Majnu Mia. It was the Granada striker’s fifth shot.

Until 70 minutes the Brothers somehow held the defense. However, the next minute was flooded with goals. This half came four more goals! In other words, Abahani opened the scoreboard again in the 71st minute. Taking the ball off a defender’s feet, Washington entered the box alone and found the goalkeeper alone to give the team the lead for the third goal. Two minutes later Robiul’s powerful shot from Jonathan’s free-kick could not be properly saved by a defender. Washington tapped in from in front of the post to complete his first hat trick of the season.

In the 82nd minute, Granada’s forward Cornelius entered the box from the right side and scored with a strong shot. Cornelius scored another goal in the 86th minute. Cornelius put the final nail in the Brothers’ coffin with a superb left-footed backheel pass from Washington.
